title: Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters' dialog
OB: When previewing a report and clicking the 'Show Report Parameters' button, all values in the Enter Parameters dialog are empty.
EB: I expect the default values to be shown in the value box of the Enter Parameters dialog, so that I can easily modify the parameter I want to change without having to input all values manually.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Preview a report.
2. Click the 'Show Report Parameters' button.
3. Observe that all values in the Enter Parameters dialog are empty.
